page.title: 08SYMINGTON LIBRARY IN 1985
page.content: There has been a library in Symington for about 20 years.In our survey out of 10 people 3 do not go a lot to the library 7 of them do. Mrs Holmes (librarian and part-time secretary)and Mrs Blake run the library along with help from some others. The library building is very close to the Primary School. Every class visits the library once a week. Out of 8 people surveyed 6 go once a week to the library,1 goes once a fortnight and 1 once in three weeks to the library. The most popular type of book is adventure.Next comes fiction and then fact.3 people said they were too busy to visit the library more often than they do. Everyone in the village can apply for a library ticket and use the library as often as they wish.Each book can be borrowed for 3 weeks.If your book is overdue you are fined 5p per day.
